name: Goodnight Rudy
description:
Good night RUDY, 111% 6th game!

Match three of the same tiles.
Vertically, horizontally or by a right angle. Doesn’t matter! As long as there are three of a kind.
The tiles disappear as you match them.
Set the tiles on the grid as you wish.

Download unique wallpapers for your smartphone by unlocking new themes!
Good night Rudy. Sleep tight, don’t let the bed bugs bite.

Simple, but Addictive.
Good night RUDY by 111%
---------------------------------------------------------------------
Game Features
- Sound effects are pretty attractive.
- Challenge your friends with GooglePlay.
- Easy and fun to play, very addictive.
- Check our facebook page, there is a tip on getting a high score.

BBTAN, CCTAN, POPONG!, Charles, CtrlCV and Good night RUDY!
Share your screenshots online SNS such as Facebook or Instagram.
Enjoy Goodnight RUDY while you commute, on a date, in the bus or subway, waiting at the bank and so on. Anytime, any where you can play GoodnightRUDY!!
